div.h2: A Warm Welcome From Superintendent David Patterson

div.p: Dear Charlton Heston Academy Community Members: Sharing in the successes thus far at Charlton Heston Academy (CHA) has been nothing short of awesome! Each and every day it becomes more and more apparent that CHA has broken the mold of traditional education...

div.div: Hi! I’m Miss Rodriguez and I’ve taught at Charlton Heston Academy for 3½ years. I’ve been one of the kindergarten teachers since I’ve started and
I had the opportunity to attend Charlton Heston Academy and graduate in 2018. It’s a rather long adventure as to how I ended up in
My name is Jenny Wangler and I am a 2nd-grade teacher at CHA. I am a native of the area as I was born and
Working at Charlton Heston Academy has changed my life. Growing up in Roscommon, I am very familiar with Saint Helen. I grew up with my

p.strong: We promise families a school with a challenging academic program and a culture that values integrity, academic excellence, civic responsibility that centers on college and career readiness.

div.p: Charlton Heston Academy | All Rights Reserved.
